thread.section_title: Axminster Tools & Machinery Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.axminster.co.uk
thread.title: John Smith
thread.title_full: Axminster Tools & Machinery reviewed by John Smith

author: John Smith
title: John Smith
text:
I chose a festool mitre saw for a particular job I had to do. Whilst making my choice at the Nuneaton branch I received in depth help on the saws available.
On returning home I was viewing some other tools on you tube (fatal don't do it) and realised that whilst the tool I purchased was perfect for the job, it was not as versatile as a chop saw and bench. I returned the unopened purchase the next week (no problem) and received even more help with my new purchase. All this and s good price too.
